title: Case Study Quiz: APM Compensation
description: Test your understanding of the APM compensation package.

questions.question: What is the total CTC (Cost to Company) offered in this compensation package?
questions.explanation: The total CTC is explicitly stated as ₹ 26,84,910.

questions.question: Over what period do the ESOPs vest?
questions.explanation: The case study specifies that ESOPs vest over 4 years.

questions.question: How much is the monthly limit for telephone reimbursements?
questions.explanation: The case study clearly states a monthly limit of ₹1,000 for telephone reimbursements.

questions.question: Based on the provided information, which component of the compensation package has a one-time payout with the first payroll?
questions.explanation: The Relocation Bonus is the only component described as a one-time payout with the first payroll.

questions.question: Considering the provided information, what is the most significant component of the cash compensation package?
questions.explanation: The base pay (₹ 18,00,000) significantly outweighs the other cash components mentioned.
